com.optimizely.ab.config

Class ProjectConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.optimizely.ab.config.ProjectConfig

  • @Immutable
public class ProjectConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the Optimizely Project configuration.
    See Also:
    Project JSON

    • Method Detail

      • getExperimentForKey

        @CheckForNull
public Experiment getExperimentForKey(@Nonnull
                                                     java.lang.String experimentKey,
                                                     @Nonnull
                                                     ErrorHandler errorHandler)
        Helper method to retrieve the Experiment for the given experiment key. If RaiseExceptionErrorHandler is provided, either an experiment is returned, or an exception is sent to the error handler if there are no experiments in the project config with the given experiment key. If NoOpErrorHandler is used, either an experiment or null is returned.
        Parameters:
        experimentKey - the experiment to retrieve from the current project config
        errorHandler - the error handler to send exceptions to
        Returns:
        the experiment for given experiment key

      • getEventTypeForName

        @CheckForNull
public EventType getEventTypeForName(java.lang.String eventName,
                                                    ErrorHandler errorHandler)
        Helper method to retrieve the EventType for the given event name. If RaiseExceptionErrorHandler is provided, either an event type is returned, or an exception is sent to the error handler if there are no event types in the project config with the given name. If NoOpErrorHandler is used, either an event type or null is returned.
        Parameters:
        eventName - the event type to retrieve from the current project config
        errorHandler - the error handler to send exceptions to
        Returns:
        the event type for the given event name

      • setForcedVariation

        public boolean setForcedVariation(@Nonnull
                                  java.lang.String experimentKey,
                                  @Nonnull
                                  java.lang.String userId,
                                  @Nullable
                                  java.lang.String variationKey)
        Force a user into a variation for a given experiment. The forced variation value does not persist across application launches. If the experiment key is not in the project file, this call fails and returns false.
        Parameters:
        experimentKey - The key for the experiment.
        userId - The user ID to be used for bucketing.
        variationKey - The variation key to force the user into. If the variation key is null then the forcedVariation for that experiment is removed.
        Returns:
        boolean A boolean value that indicates if the set completed successfully.

      • getForcedVariation

        @Nullable
public Variation getForcedVariation(@Nonnull
                                               java.lang.String experimentKey,
                                               @Nonnull
                                               java.lang.String userId)
        Gets the forced variation for a given user and experiment.
        Parameters:
        experimentKey - The key for the experiment.
        userId - The user ID to be used for bucketing.
        Returns:
        The variation the user was bucketed into. This value can be null if the forced variation fails.
